actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress and certain congressional employees.
subjects: Old age, survivors and disability insurance
subjects_top_term: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code and title II (Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance) of the Social Security Act to provide coverage under the Old Age, Survivors and Disability Insurance program for Members of Congress and congressional employees.

titles.title: A bill to provide mandatory social security coverage for Members of Congress and certain congressional employees.
